summary: This document is a collection of Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York administrative forms from August 8, 2019, including a Bureau of Prisons count sheet, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips. The forms detail inmate population counts by housing unit and administrative procedures, with one roster entry marked for an inmate on suicide watch or unassigned status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 763 inmates verified across multiple housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 8, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.
An inmate roster lists one inmate with the assignment 'HOSP OCT' and notes 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', indicating a possible suicide watch status.
The total inmate census for MCC New York on this date was recorded as 763 inmates.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts and assignments.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text excerpts.
